sentences: Elanud on vana ja tuntud rahvas Kaukaasias.
Seda rahva peeti elanuteks ajaloolistes allikates.
Alaanide ehk elanude asualad olid Musta mere ääres.
context: The word 'elanud' appears to be the Estonian name for the Alans, an ancient nomadic Iranian-speaking people who lived in the North Caucasus and steppes around the Black Sea. It's used as a proper noun referring to this specific historical ethnic group.
